alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lower Keys in Monroe and Middle Keys in Monroe Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marathon, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marathon, East End Of Long Key Viaduct, Seven Mile Bridge, Long Key Viaduct, East End Of Seven Mile Bridge, West End Of Long Key Viaduct, West End Of Seven Mile Bridge, Ohio Key, Bahia Honda Key and Boot Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 37 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys
